summary: Completed comprehensive testing of new Mood Triggers/Tags and Animated SVG Icons features. All 13 specified features working correctly - backend APIs, frontend UI integration, trigger selection, statistics insights, and animated mood icons.
passed_tests: GET /api/trigger-types returns 12 trigger types (posao, san, vezba, drustvo, ishrana, porodica, zdravlje, vreme, novac, ucenje, odmor, kreativnost)
POST /api/moods with triggers field saves triggers correctly
GET /api/moods returns entries with triggers array
GET /api/moods/stats returns trigger_insights array with avg scores per trigger
Mood entry page shows trigger selector after mood selection
Clicking trigger tags toggles selection with proper visual feedback (fill color when selected)
Saving mood with triggers works correctly and redirects to dashboard
Statistics page shows 'Šta Utiče na Tvoje Raspoloženje' section with trigger bars showing avg scores
Calendar day detail shows trigger tags for selected days
Dashboard today's mood card displays trigger tags
Animated mood icons work on Landing page (8 SVG icons with framer-motion animations)
Selected mood on MoodEntry page has animation and visual selection state
All existing features work (auth, navigation, premium, AI tips, gamification)
